items.sentence: You're the one who taught Tom French, aren't you?
What's the best gift that you've ever been given?
Give me one reason why I should help you do that.
Tom offered a homeless person something to drink.
I can't remember what my grandfather looked like.
You know quite a lot about basketball, don't you?
We all knew that sooner or later it would happen.
I won't be here for more than two or three hours.
Tom wants you to know he really wants to do that.
Everybody here knows we won't be able to do that.
